questionnaire.name: Module 4: Conclusion and reflection

question.content: What communications channels will be best for reaching your target participants? (Required)
What organizations, events, or community figures might be able to help you spread the word? (Required)
What are the key outcomes you want to highlight in your communications? Why will these resonate with your stakeholders? (Required)
How will you measure whether your pre-apprenticeship is meeting its intended outcomes? (Required)
What organizations, events, or community figures might be able to help you spread the word?
